content: I worked for the military, the government, and security services before and I am of the opinion that the 9/11 attacks could have been prevented and that the terrorists could have been stopped thus also preventing the US from being entangled in foreign wars. I would like to know what other members think. Could the attacks have been prevented? Could the terrorists have been stopped. Could the wars in Iraq and Afghanistan have been prevented? Could Usama Bin Muhammed Bin Laden have been captured long ago? Could someone have already collected the reward for the capture or death of Bin Laden? Tell me what you think...

content: Ummm....yer asking an awful lot of questions here, new-guy. But in the order in which you ask them: 1)& 2) No, with the information we had at the time. But yes if every passenger on the planes had an UZI strapped to their person somewhere. 3) Yeah, the wars could have been prevented if the President chose to ignore the attacks. 4) Of course U.B.M.Bin Laden could have been captured long ago. We could have captured his entire kindergarten class and sent them to GITMO to polish land mines. 5) Highly unlikely since a new tape has just been released by him. How do we know it is really him speaking? Well gee whizz, George...I hope you as a former major would be familiar with our advances in technology. Almost everyone else here is. So feel free to elaborate on how the U.S.Government could have prevented such a crime back in Sept.2001, and the consequences as a result. Be sure to be partisan and throw in a couple of conspiracy theories.

content: Even a blind squirrel finds a nut once in awhile. As for Oswald I have studied the JFK assassination on and off since it occurred and as much as I hate to admit it Oswald acted alone. How he got the job at the book repository shortly before the arrival of JFK and that he went undiscovered for shooting at another politician weeks before are mysteries. The Ruby-connection doesn't add up either. Another thing is that Goldwater was expected to be a shoe-in for Prez in '64 but he lost his momentum when JFK was killed and the country went into mourning. As for John-John saluting if you look at the actual footage he was protecting his eyes from the sun. Still it made a nice pic. When Jackie went onto the trunk of the car it appears she was under stress and went to retrieve a piece of her husband's head which had just been shot. There may have been other assassins present unbeknownst to Oswald but Marine rifle marksmanship training made it possible for a born-loser to destroy a born-winner. Jealousy is powerful stuff.

content: I UNDERSTAND AL QAEDA IS A NETWORK AND THAT THERE ARE A BILLION MUSLIMS. I HAVE SEEN FILMS OF MUSLIMS CELEBRATING ON 9/11. I WAS AN SO/SECURITY OFFICER IN FLORIDA FOR YEARS AND WAS ALSO CIVIL SERVICE. IT WAS INTERESTING TO HAVE ACTUALLY SEEN MOHAMMED ATTA IN FLORIDA IN PERSON. THEY WERE HERE TAKING FLYING LESSONS IN VENICE. ATTA AND AL SHEHHI WERE ALL OVER SOUTH FLORIDA PREPARING FOR THE ATTACKS. THEY HAD OPENED BANK ACCOUNTS AT THE SUNTRUST BRANCH IN DOWNTOWN MIAMI WHERE THEY HAD FUNDS TRANSFERRED SO THAT THEY COULD CONTINUE "STUDYING" AND TAKING THEIR FLYING LESSONS. AS A FLORIDA SECURITY OFFICER IT UPSET ME THAT THESE MEN WERE DOING AS THEY PLEASED IN SOUTH FLORIDA JUST YEARS AFTER OPERATION DESERT SHIELD AND OPERATION DESERT STORM. KNOWING OF THE BOMBING OF THE WTC GARAGE BY RAMZI YOUSEF DID NOT GIVE ME FAITH IN THESE MEN, ESPECIALLY WHILE BIN LADEN'S MEN WERE STILL WANTED FOR THE ATTACK ON KHOBAR TOWERS AND THE ATTACK ON THE USS COLE. LOOKING BACK , I THINK I WAS WELL ARMED AT THE TIME THESE TWO PILOTS OF THE FIRST TWO PLANES THAT CRASHED INTO WTC WERE IN MY VICINITY. I REGRET TO THIS DAY THAT I DID NOT PUT BULLETS IN THESE MEN WHEN I HAD THEM IN MY SIGHT. ALL I HAD TO DO WAS PULL THE TRIGGER AND I COULD HAVE AT LEAST STOPPED THE PILOT OF THE FIRST PLANE, MOHAMMED ATTA. I WILL ALWAYS REGRET THAT I DID NOT SHOOT THE EGYTIAN WHEN HE WAS IN MY SIGHT.

title: DO YOU THINK THE 911 TERRORISTS COULD HAVE BEEN STOPPED?

content: In 1988 I worked in the Recruiting Office at Ft Riley, KS and everyday saw Iraqi fighter pilots in the snackbar. We were training them before Desert Shield. Perhaps that is why the Iraqi Airforce did not get involved in Desert Storm but kinda' sat back and watched. At the time the Gramm-Rudman-Hollings budget-cuts were granting early-outs to many soldiers however we gave them all the hardsell to join the Guard, Reserve or IRR and most still had statuatory commitment time left. These soldiers were given Overseas Ribbons for spending ten months in Hawaii and Good Conduct Medals for less than 2yr service. When would they ever get to wear them unless they joined the reserves? We snared at least a third to the reserve forces and actually substantually increased the size of the military and saved gov't money in the short-term. Then, surprize-surprize-surprize, Desert Shield/Storm.

Perhaps that is why the Iraqi Airforce did not get involved in Desert Storm but kinda' sat back and watched. At the time the Gramm-Rudman-Hollings budget-cuts were granting early-outs to many soldiers however we gave them all the hardsell to join the Guard, Reserve or IRR and most still had statuatory commitment time left. These soldiers were given Overseas Ribbons for spending ten months in Hawaii and Good Conduct Medals for less than 2yr service. When would they ever get to wear them unless they joined the reserves? We snared at least a third to the reserve forces and actually substantually increased the size of the military and saved gov't money in the short-term. Then, surprize-surprize-surprize, Desert Shield/Storm.

content: http://www.cnn.com/2009/US/04/27/low.flying.plane/index.html NEW YORK (CNN) -- A White House official apologized Monday after a low-flying Boeing 747 spotted above the Manhattan skyline frightened workers and residents into evacuating buildings. The huge aircraft, which functions as Air Force One when the president is aboard, was taking part in a classified, government-sanctioned photo shoot, the Federal Aviation Administration said. "Last week, I approved a mission over New York. I take responsibility for that decision," said Louis Caldera, director of the White House Military Office. "While federal authorities took the proper steps to notify state and local authorities in New York and New Jersey, it's clear that the mission created confusion and disruption." Witnesses reported seeing the plane circle over the Upper New York Bay near the Statue of Liberty before flying up the Hudson River. It was accompanied by two F-16s. NEW: Official says President Obama "furious" about incident INTERESTING STORY TODAY FROM CNN AIR FORCE ONE ESCORTED BY TWO F-16'S FLYING LOW OVER NYC ON APRIL 27TH, 2009
